pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Phone Manager is a program created to allow you to control aspects of your mobile phone from your GNOME desktop.
The software is in its early stages right now. Current features include: * Runs in the background; indicates status on the panel notification area. * Display on-screen alert when text message (SMS) arrives * Text message (SMS) sending facility
Phone Manager supports any mobile phone that can connect to your computer as a serial port: via Bluetooth, IrDA or a serial cable.
